take.tool_desc: Pick up a specific object from a receptacle or location.

args.arg_desc: The object you want to take
The receptacle or location where the object is currently located

put.tool_desc: Place an object you're currently holding into or onto a receptacle.

args.arg_desc: The object you want to put down (must be in your inventory)
The receptacle or location where you want to place the object

open.tool_desc: Open a closed container or receptacle to access its contents.

args.arg_desc: The container or receptacle you want to open

close.tool_desc: Close an open container or receptacle.

args.arg_desc: The container or receptacle you want to close

toggle.tool_desc: Toggle the state of an object or device (turn on/off).

args.arg_desc: The object or receptacle whose state you want to toggle

clean.tool_desc: Clean an object using a specific cleaning tool or receptacle.

args.arg_desc: The object you want to clean
The tool or receptacle you want to use for cleaning

cool.tool_desc: Cool an object using a cooling device or receptacle.

args.arg_desc: The object you want to cool
The cooling device or receptacle to use

heat.tool_desc: Heat an object using a heating device or receptacle.

args.arg_desc: The object you want to heat
The heating device or receptacle to use

inventory.tool_desc: Check what objects you are currently carrying.

examine.tool_desc: Closely examine an object or receptacle to get more detailed information about it.

args.arg_desc: The object or receptacle you want to examine

go.tool_desc: Move to a specific location or receptacle in the environment.

args.arg_desc: The location or receptacle you want to go to
Optional intermediate location to pass through

check.tool_desc: Check what actions are currently valid in your current state and location.

args.arg_desc: Should be set to 'valid actions' to check available actions

look.tool_desc: Look around to observe your current surroundings and the objects in the environment.

use.tool_desc: Use or interact with a specific object or device.

args.arg_desc: The object or receptacle you want to use
